- Consult with new and existing clients regarding their ERP solution- Lead business process reviews, gather requirements, gap analysis, design and present functional solutions and recommendations- Ability to configure and implement most, if not all, modules within NetSuite - Accounting and finance acumen- Perform data migration tasks from legacy systems to current business solutions- Perform system testing and issue resolution support- Create financial statements using NetSuite or other financial reporting tools- Skilled in writing project related documents that include:    Business Requirement Documents   Gap Analysis   Statement of Work   Functional Specifications   Process Flow Diagrams    Training Materials- Trusted advisor to most, if not all, customers for providing Accounting, Finance, business and system best practices and recommendations- Capable of estimating and scoping projects based on requirements gathered during discovery events- Troubleshoot and support NetSuite applications

Joined this start-up business as the first employee, directly participating in its growth and development to achieve its current market position as a highly regarded NetSuite Solutions Provider. Started with the company in an administrative role and accepted additional responsibility as a business analyst, lead consultant, project manager, solution architect, management, business partner and C-Level Executive.- Improved operational and software implementation efficiency through the implementation of the Agile Methodology- Lead efforts for recruiting, hiring, mentoring, coaching, and restructuring organizational teams.  Grew the business from 2 to 40+ employees in two locations- Trusted advisor for internal strategy as well as requested by our customer’s C-Level teams for recommendations and best practices- Primary responsibilities include the following organizational areas: Project Management, Consulting and Development Services and Finance / Administration

Erin served as a great Chief Operating Officer for 360.  She was very detail-oriented, understood process and procedure of not only internally at 360 but knew the vast majority of our clients' process and procedures.  She always had an open door policy and was always delighted to help with solving customer issues.  She stood as a great leader within the group and helped rally all the members of 360 in times of stress.  During her tenure with 360, Erin always found a way to make work enjoyable. I often found myself in her office discussing ways to help improve not only moral but my day to day interactions with teams. She helped guide me to become a leader and assisted in process changes that I would suggest for my team.  Erin was an great leader and boss, I truly enjoyed everyday with her.

September 9, 2015, Grant reported directly to Erin

I reported into Erin for 3.5 years and had a fantastic experience.  My favorite characteristic that she possesses is that she always finishes what she commits to.  She has an incredibly high degree of accountability and really cares about the people she works with.  I was consistently amazed by her attention to detail especially as it pertained to her writing skills (specifically creating SOW's for clients).  Erin did a phenomenal job of taking our small start up company and creating all of the operational processes that ran the business and allowed us to scale up to nearly 50 employees.  She accomplished this through her leadership skills and her constant focus on increasing our organizations operational efficiency.  Erin achieved all of this while simultaneously managing our companies HR responsibilities and handling the organizations escalated customer issues.  Erin displayed an unrivaled work ethic and ability to multi-task day in and day out the entire time I had the pleasure of working with her.

Brad Thompson
Director of Consulting Services
September 4, 2015, Brad reported directly to Erin

I was a direct report to Erin Compton for nearly four years.  During this time, our company experienced explosive growth and employee count went from six to 40.  Erin was responsible for all operations.  She was key in facilitating a merger and several office moves.  She moved our company from zero policies and procedures to having formal, documented processes.  She was instrumental in driving the completion of an employee handbook, a robust interviewing and on boarding process, improved benefits and the launch of our 401k plan.  She remained a product expert and mentor for our consulting and implementation teams.  She was respected for her business acumen, professionalism and proven track record of solving problems.  She brought a great work ethic every day and a sense of humor at the right time.  As a manager, she was the ideal mix of supportive and directive.  She knew when to insert herself to provide guidance and direction and when delegate, trust and follow up.  Our customers loved her and the employees respected her.  Without hesitation, I would recommend Erin to be a part of any organization.

July 29, 2016, Erin was senior to Brian but didn’t manage directly

“Fierce Determination” is the phrase that comes to mind when I think of Brian! I hired Brian to fill an open NetSuite Consulting position we had at the time.  He came to us without direct NetSuite experience but that didn’t stop him from quickly coming up to speed on the product, our customers and projects that needed to be managed. He jumped in and drove to completion a few custom development projects that needed immediate attention. His commitment to these projects was commendable … late nights, weekends, whatever it took to get the job done. And he always did it with a smile and a great attitude! Whether it was a new implementation, custom project or support Brian wouldn’t stop until everything was completed.  Brian is an excellent consultant and I would highly recommend him!

It’s rare that you come across a standout talent like Eric.  We hired Eric as a developer in August 2012 and he quickly proved his ability to architect and code in NetSuite. Eric was a key developer on some of our largest and most difficult projects. He was also an integral player in our adoption of Agile and really led the initiative internally.  I am particularly impressed with Eric’s drive to continually learn, develop and grow professionally. He is constantly reading and seeking out knowledge on how to improve himself and those things that he can influence.  With Eric’s professionalism and NetSuite expertise, I would highly recommend him.
